about_the_game: The Fifth Ingredient expansion for Potion Explosion gives you the chance to go back to class and learn new tricks. Introducing Ghost Ectoplasm, which will force you to complete spells in an entirely new way. This incredible ingredient can be used as a replacement for any of the others. The Fifth Ingredient also adds Reward and Scolding tokens, new potions to complete, and Professor tiles. All of these new elements will affect the rules of the game in little ways that could change your entire strategy for a welcoming challenge! Use one for a little tweak to your normal gameplay or introduce a bunch for a completely new gaming experience. Try the Fifth Ingredient expansion and you’ll surely be learning new tricks up until the final bell sounds!
